page.title: 04Kingswood Whitsun Parade
page.content: Monday 27th May 1985 was Kingswood's 40th annual{Procession of Christian {Witness.}10,000 spectators lined a 1 mile route, through Two Mile Hill, Regent Street and Hanham Road, to watch 25 local churches parade decorated lorries, on which adults and children enacted scenes from the Bible and tableaux depicted the theme,"Youth for God".There were 9{marching bands,} and my band,The Crofts End Mission Band(in which I play the cornet)led the parade.Dressed in blue and black uniforms, we play at local events,elderly people's homes,weddings and for charity. Recently we played at Bath's Pump Rooms in aid of the physically handicapped. Our musical programme includes military marches, war-time music, and music from the Black and White Minstrel Shows.
